scenario_text.value: No sign of Haru or Miyuki here either.

We need to find them, and fast! They need our
help.

Yes, those monsters are quite dangerous. But
what could they be planning?

Dangerous monsters, huh. You know, I can’t
help but wonder. If it were me...

If I was the one who got dragged off, would
everyone try this hard to find me?
Would you look for Minoru?
That depends.
Of course!
Just don’t get taken.
That would depend on the situation.

What? Hey, you’re supposed to say not to
worry, that you’ve got my back!

Look, obviously I wouldn’t want to abandon
you, but you never know what might happen.

I guess that’s true, but it doesn’t make me
feel any better.

Don’t worry, Minoru. I’d go after you no
matter what!

I knew I could count on you! But seriously,
keep me from getting taken to begin with.

Of course! Why would you even think we
wouldn’t? We’re not about to abandon anyone.
Thanks, Takuma.

Still, better to keep an eye out so I don’t
get taken to begin with.
Fear not, for you have me at your side.
Haha, that’s true.

Just don’t get taken to begin with. Searching
is hard work, as you no doubt know by now.

Well, yeah, I’m not denying that, but could
you at least answer my question?

Fear not. I would search for you. Alone if
need be.
Thanks, Falcomon.

Hey, what’s up? Did you get spooked? Come
back to make sure I’m still around?

Nah, I knew you’d be okay. You’ve got
Falcomon here with you.
That’s right. There’s no need to fear.

Minoru may be undisciplined and prone to all
manner of danger, but I will keep him safe.

Yeah, he’s easily lost, and he doesn’t always
think things through, so I appreciate it.

Oh, sure, everybody laugh it up. I swear, one
of these days I really will go missing.
